document_data.mainbody:
Eldon Keyward was a Neverwintian noble, a priest of Deneir, and a scholar specialized in the outer planes in the late 15 century DR.
In the 1490s DR, Eldon and other three nobles were kidnapped by group of Vecna cultists and taken to Neverwinters graveyard, Neverdeath. He was then caged and subjected to a ritual lasting several hours with the purpose of sacrificing his secrets to Vecna.
